body_html:
You'll want to use train_and_evaluate, so that eval runs every once in a while. The hook just reads the eval metrics and stops when the condition is met. So, if you're not running eval, it'll not stop. Relevant line:

tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/estimator/python/estimator/early_stopping.py

Line 361 in 4dcfddc

eval_results = read_eval_metrics(eval_dir)

body: You'll want to use train_and_evaluate, so that eval runs every once in a while. The hook just reads the eval metrics and stops when the condition is met. So, if you're not running eval, it'll not stop. Relevant line: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/4dcfddc5d12018a5a0fdca652b9221ed95e9eb23/tensorflow/contrib/estimator/python/estimator/early_stopping.py#L361
